title: Email Hacked Need Help
body: I found out that my email for my main account was hacked! Is there a way to remove my account off of that email onto my new one so i'm not worried about hackers having access to my personal info on my League account? (Support ticket also never fixed my issue on this so please help me.)

replies.body: If you still have access to your email, you can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to manually change and verify a new email.  If you still have any issues, you can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help out after verifying account ownership.  Good luck!

You can ask riot to protective ban your account. Once they place that on your account. Message riot support to recover your account and ask them to switch emails. I would also contact the email provider on getting your email account back just in case riot does not want to protect your account.
ok ill see where that goes. i appreciate the tip {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
No problem mate. I hate seeing peoples accounts get possibly hijacked.

Sadly that works both ways. If a hacker had access to any support e-mails that had been sent they can use that very information to get Riot to Recover the account TO THEM.  Literally just happened to me. I'm just lucky I'm still logged in to this account on this machine. But He already swapped the account e-mail and changed the password. So I'm now struggling to get this mess sorted out. And it doesn't even look like Riot has 2-Factor auth yet....at least not that I've been able to find.
